name: LASER LAB
description:
LASER LAB is a 3D puzzle game with the theme of exploration and interaction. The core gameplay is to interact with laser devices in order to reroute laser paths and escape. In this game, players only need to push and rotate, which is very easy to start with. It contains a total of 9 levels, and the overall gameplay time is about 40-80 minutes.
Wanna have some fun with 3D puzzles? Hope you enjoy it!
